headline: GOP proxy battle in Ohio Senate primary reaches fever pitch
author: Max Greenwood
sentences:

The Republican Senate primary in Ohio is one of several nominating contests in May that are seen as key tests of Trumps reputation as a political kingmaker and ability to bend the GOP electorate to his will ahead of a potential 2024 comeback bid for the White House.

Matt Gaetz (R-Fla.) and Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-Ga.), are making a series of campaign stops with Vance.

Kellyanne Conway, Trumps 2016 campaign manager and a former White House adviser, is backing former Ohio state GOP Chair Jane Timken in the Senate primary, while Sen. Rand Paul (R-Ky.) has endorsed another candidate, businessman Mike Gibbons, and is set to appear at a tele-townhall for him on Monday.
